name: 9series Solutions Pvt. Ltd
description:
9series is an eminent enterprise mobility & website development organisation with a niche in delivering quality services and solutions to customers across the globe.
With a decade in IT we have a team of 60+in development, 100+ mobile apps developed, 300+ clients served successfully, and spread across various countries such as Sweden, Norway, Ireland, Finland, UK, Germany, France, Italy, South Africa, Ghana, Kenya, USA, Canada, Australia, Singapore, Malaysia, Turkey, Egypt, Iran, UAE, still more to add.
Our Technology Expertise
Next Generation Technology - Blockchain, AR & VR, ChatBots, Machine Learning, IoT, Big Data
Mobile App Development - Android, iOS, Hybrid
Web Development - C#.Net, PHP, Python, ReactJs, VueJs, NodeJs, AngularJs, Laravel, Full Stack, Firebase, ExpressJS, & lot more
Open Source Development - Orange HRMS, Suite CRM, Dolibarr ERP, VFX Pipeline software, Magento, Joomla, Wordpress, Moodle, SnipeIT, Open ERP Customization, JAVA
Enterprise Development - Microsoft Dynamics, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Azure, SugarCRM, AWS, Google Cloud, HRMS
Database Development - SQL Database (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL), NoSQL Database (Hadoop, MongoDB)
Design - UI/UX, Responsive Web Design, Mobile App Design, Wire-frames & Mockup Design, HTML & CSS Development, CSS Development, Stationery Design
Digital Marketing & More
READ MORE...
